title: Low-Maintenance Landscape Design Ideas for Busy Homeowners
intro: Chicago homeowners want beautiful yards that don’t demand endless upkeep. These professional design strategies reduce maintenance while maintaining a polished appearance.
content:
Use Perennials Instead of Annuals

Perennials return year after year, saving time and money. Native plants like coneflowers and black-eyed Susans thrive in Chicago’s climate.

Choose Durable Hardscaping

Paver patios, retaining walls, and stone borders require minimal upkeep compared to wood or mulch-heavy designs.

Install Drought-Tolerant Plants

Switching to low-water landscapes eliminates constant watering during summer.

Conclusion

Beautiful landscapes can be effortless with the right planning.
